dmca.title: Complaint regarding copyrighted material
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

 


________________________________

From: Phil Bayfield VIP Texting LTD [mailto:phil@viptexting.com] 
Posted At: Monday, October 09, 2006 7:21 PM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Complaint regarding copyrighted material
Subject: Complaint regarding copyrighted material



Dear ThePlanet,

We would like to notify you of illegal copyrighted material present on a
server within your data centre.

The offending material is located at:

http://www.msolutions.cc/brochures/mCHAT_Case_Studies.pdf

The server IP is: 70.85.155.226

The company, txtNation has published falsified quotes apparently made by
our company, and has also published our logo and is claiming we are one
of their client's, none of this information is true.

We have requested that they remove the material and they have ignored
our requests, because of this we are now seeking legal action against
them, however we would much rather avoid the legal route and were hoping
you would be able to do something at your end?

I believe as the hosting provider, you do have a certain amount of
control if one of your clients are breaking the law?

We are also one of your clients and we would greatly appropriate it if
you could intervene and request that txtNation remove the material.


Thank you in advance for any assistance you can provide,


Regards,
Phil Bayfield
Managing Director
VIP Texting Ltd

--
